description:
Title/Role: Secretary

Duration: 3 Months contract (If performance good there is a chance to extend)

job Location: Brooklyn, New York

Zip Code: 11203

Timings: 9 Am to 5.00 Pm

Need to be fully vaccinated

The hourly rate for this position is between $24-27 per hour.

Compensation

Factors which may affect starting pay within this range may include [geography/market, skills, education, experience, and other qualifications of the successful candidate].

JOB DISCRIPTION

Ability to accurately create, edit, save, and print documents using Microsoft Word and Excel. Ability to professionally, handle phones, schedule appointments, maintain calendar, type approximately 50 wpm.

Required

Two years’ experience.

  • EMAIL ENCRYPTION
  • SCHEDULE APPOINTMENTS
  • EXCEL
  • SECRETARY
  • STAFFING

Additional

  • MICROSOFT WORD
  • FAXING

﻿

I look forward to hearing from you soon.
